plugins.name: Figma Recall
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you save, manage, and switch between different versions (iterations) of your Figma frames.


Save an Iteration: Select a frame and click the Save button to save its current state.


Save with a Note: Hold Ctrl/Cmd and click the Save button to add a text description to your saved iteration.


Recall All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Recall button to view all its saved versions side-by-side.


Update Iterations: Make changes in the recalled container frame for any version and click Save to update with your changes in the stored master versions.


Navigate Versions: Use the < and > arrow buttons to cycle through saved iterations directly on your canvas.


Delete All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Delete button (trash icon) to remove all its saved versions.


Rename Iterations: Right-click the Save button to rename the selected frame and its entire group of saved iterations.
plugins.tagline: Version History but for Each Frame

plugins.name: Remote Variable Replacer
plugins.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
plugins.tagline: Replace those pesky remote variables!

In the meantime, I got you.
135284.release_notes:
Improved the dropdowns for numerical variables to only show local variables whose base value match the remote variable base value. This should make the plugin easy to navigate if a user has hundreds of variables.

Removed beta language; Included network access for tailwind for easy stying and unpkg.com for React. This should fix the blank screen of death. Rookie mistake!

Also updated the data security details to let users know the network access is only for static items.

plugins.name: Get Image Type
plugins.description:
A simple plugin that analyzes your selected images and reveals their file formats with a single click. Stop guessing if that asset is a JPG, PNG, SVG, or WebP.


Does not support:

  1. Video/Movie Files: This plugin does not support identification of video or movie formats.


Note: Figma automatically converts certain image formats during import. HEIC and TIFF/TIF files are converted to PNG format when imported into Figma, so the plugin will identify these as PNGs. This reflects the actual format of the image within Figma, not necessarily the original source format.

accepted.name: Farren Wang
accepted.description: Farren's Figma account. Here you'll find stuff she's proud of.

plugins.tagline: Identify the format of images in your Figma designs

plugins.name: WCAG Contrast Auditor
plugins.description:
WCAG Contrast Auditor is a Figma plugin that helps you guarantee your text meets WCAG accessibility standards—no manual math or guesswork required. Simply:


  1. Select the text layers you want to check (or select a parent frame to audit everything inside).
  2. Pick your background color and target WCAG level (AA or AAA).
  3. Run Audit to instantly see how many layers pass or fail the chosen contrast threshold.


Key benefits:

  1. Automated compliance checks: Scan dozens or hundreds of text layers in seconds.
  2. Flexible thresholds: Choose between WCAG AA (4.5:1) or AAA (7:1) contrast ratios.
  3. Lightweight & zero setup: No external dependencies—just install and go.
  4. Actionable results: Get a quick pass/fail count so you know exactly where to focus your fixes.


Whether you’re building design systems, client deliverables, or internal UIs, WCAG Contrast Auditor makes accessibility a seamless, one-click step in your workflow. Ensure every color combination is compliant—and ship more inclusive products today!
plugins.tagline: Spot & Fix WCAG Contrast Issues Instantly.

plugins.name: Frame Navigator
plugins.description:
🧭 FrameNavigator


Effortlessly navigate large and complex Figma files with FrameNavigator — a floating Table of Contents plugin that helps you stay organized and move between frames in a single click.


✨ Key Features


- Quick Navigation

Instantly jump to any frame from a floating panel that stays visible while you work.


- Custom Frame Registration

Select frames directly on the canvas and add them to your TOC with a simple "+" button.


- Group Organization

Organize your frames into custom groups for better structure and clarity—perfect for managing multiple screens.


- Flexible Panel Sizes

Choose between default, compact, and full views to match your workflow and screen space.


---


🛠 How It Works


  1. Register a Frame: Select a frame on the Figma canvas and click the `+` button in the plugin to add it to the TOC.
  2. Create a Group: Hover over ungrouped frames in the TOC and click the appearing checkbox to select them. Then click the Create Group button at the top of the panel to group them.
  3. Add to Existing Group: Select a group first, then select a new frame on the canvas and click `+` to add the frame into that group.
  4. Rename a Group: Double-click on a group name to edit it.
  5. Remove a Group: Right-click on a group and select **Remove Group**. ⚠️ Note: All frames inside that group will also be removed from the TOC.
  6. Reorder Frames: Drag and drop frames (or groups) within the TOC to change their order.


---


Perfect for design system creators, large prototyping flows, or anyone managing multi-screen layouts in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly jump between frames with a floating table of contents. Easily build your own TOC.

plugins.name: Forma
plugins.description:
🎨 FORMA: Design Systems in Minutes, Not Months! 🚀


Ever tried creating a design system from scratch? It's like trying to fold a fitted sheet – seemingly impossible and will probably make you cry. 😭


Forma swoops in to save your sanity with magical design system generation powers:


✨ COLOR SORCERY

• Create gorgeous Pantone-style color palettes

• Generate perfect shades that actually make sense

• Turn chaotic color choices into harmonious design languages


📝 TYPOGRAPHY WIZARDRY

• Conjure complete typography hierarchies faster than you can say "Comic Sans is unacceptable"

• 9 perfectly balanced text styles that your design lead will actually approve

• Font fallbacks that won't make your developers rage-quit


🧩 DESIGN TOKENS

• Spacing systems that maintain mathematical harmony

• Size tokens that scale beautifully across devices

• Consistent radius values (because inconsistent corner radii are criminal)


⚠️ BETA ALERT ⚠️

This release is a preview of Forma's powers - not for production just yet! We're still brewing up more magical features like component generation, brand voice integration, and design consistency checks.


Created with ❤️ (and a lot of coffee) by a designer who got tired of rebuilding the same foundations over and over again.
plugins.tagline: Design System Generator

plugins.name: Numeric Variable Checker
plugins.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
plugins.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

plugins.name: Move Outside
plugins.description:
A plugin designed to move any elements outside of their current frames and place them at the top of the hierarchy while retaining their original position relative to the entire page. The plugin offers two modes:


  1. Default - Moves selected single or multiple elements to the top of the page’s layer hierarchy.
  2. Locked Target - Moves selected single or multiple elements into another specified layer. The Locked Target mode supports moving into frames, frames with autolayout, and sections. If the Locked Target is an autolayout frame, users can choose whether the moved frames should retain their original page position using absolute positioning or adapt to the autolayout.


This plugin stands out from others with similar functionality by offering a full interface that enables continuous management of complex layer structures.
plugins.tagline: A plugin used to move elements to the top of the layer hierarchy or to other frames/sections.

plugins.description:
Figma to WordPress plugin effortlessly converts Figma designs into Elementor & Essential Addons for Elementor widgets for WordPress, maintaining the integrity of styling, dimensions, and content. It bridges the gap between design and development, allowing teams to work more efficiently.


Key Highlights:


  1. 15+ Elementor Widgets – Compatible with all essential Elementor widgets.
  2. Instant Conversion – Real-time processing with visual updates.
  3. Style Consistency – Retains colors, fonts, spacing, and overall design integrity.


How It Works:


  1. API Integration – Set up your Figma API key for seamless connectivity.
  2. Naming Standards – Adhere to specific naming conventions for best performance.
  3. Select Layers – Pick the frames or components you want to convert.
  4. Automated Conversion – Let the tool process your selection, with live progress updates.
  5. Export Options – Copy the JSON code or download it directly for WordPress integration.


Usage Guidelines:


Follow these essential steps to ensure everything works smoothly:


Use a valid and active Figma API key.

Confirm you have edit access to the file.

Use ‘Auto Layout’ wherever possible to avoid design breakage.

Use ‘Containers’ if column layout breaks (optional but helpful).

All Sections & Inner Sections must contain ‘Columns’.

Frames or layers must be named using our supported Elementor widget names:


  1. Container
  2. Button
  3. Heading
  4. Text Editor
  5. Creative Button
  6. Dual Color Heading
  7. Advanced Menu
  8. Advanced Menu → Menu → Menu Active
  9. Call to Action
  10. Info Box
  11. Post Carousel
  12. Testimonial
  13. Feature List
  14. Counter → Number
  15. Logo Carousel
  16. Woo Product List
  17. Content
  18. Image
  19. Subheading
  20. Rating

accepted.name: Startise
accepted.description: With 6+ million users, Startise is the dynamic parent company of top 5 brands in industry (WPDeveloper, Storeware, xCloud & more) to help you get success.

plugins.tagline: Convert Figma designs to Elementor instantly—pixel-perfect, responsive, and effortless.

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**[>> Demo Video <<](https://youtu.be/4XOTlUGIqJU?si=OCgCe0Sw7oBB6whx)**


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "UI/UX importer for Unity" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/ui-ux-importer-for-unity-323342)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > KaiWorld UIUX Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

plugins.name: Watermark Plugin
plugins.description:
Easily add a customizable text or image watermark to any frame or group in your Figma files.

Choose text or upload a PNG/JPG, set position, size, color, opacity, and more – all in a simple and intuitive interface.


Features:


Add watermark as text or image (PNG/JPG)

Set position (X/Y), size, color, and opacity

Simple UI, works with multiple selections

No code or plugins required for recipients – just run and watermark!

Perfect for marking drafts, sharing designs, or protecting your intellectual property before sharing.

developed by Dmitry Chekalin

plugins.name: Timestamp
plugins.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.

plugins.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.

accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.name: Font Replacer
plugins.description:
Instantly view all fonts used in your selection, selectively replace specific font families, and preserve font weights and styles when switching to new fonts. Whether you're cleaning up inconsistent typography, updating your brand, or exploring new typefaces, Font Replacer makes the process fast, intuitive, and reliable.


  1. See all fonts in your selection at a glance
  2. Replace one or multiple font families with a single click
  3. Maintains font weights/styles (e.g., Bold, Italic) when switching families
  4. Handles mixed-font text layers and nested groups
  5. Smart fallbacks ensure your text always looks great
  6. Clean, modern UI with loading indicators for large selections
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly swap and manage fonts in your Figma designs

plugins.name: 批量字号行高对齐
plugins.description:
# 字号行高对齐工具


一款专为设计师打造的 Figma 插件，帮助您快速统一文本行高，提升设计规范性和效率。


## 🎯 核心功能


### 1. 智能行高设置

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，应用不同的行高倍数

- 单行文本（如标题、按钮）：默认 1.0 倍

- 段落文本（多行内容）：默认 1.8 倍

- **统一行高模式**：为所有文本应用相同的行高倍数

- **向上取偶数**：所有行高值自动向上取整为偶数，确保像素对齐


### 2. 批量查找替换

- **全局查找**：在选中的图层、画板或编组中查找所有文本

- **批量替换**：一键替换所有匹配的文本内容

- **实时预览**：输入时即时高亮显示匹配内容

- **智能定位**：点击文本列表可快速定位到对应图层


## 🎨 设计特色


- **卡片化界面**：现代简约的黑白设计风格

- **大圆角美学**：16px 圆角卡片，视觉更柔和

- **清晰的交互反馈**：橙色高亮主要操作，绿色提示成功状态

- **优化的布局**：720px 高度，提供更多内容展示空间


## 📝 使用方法


### 行高设置

1. 选择需要调整的文本图层、画板或编组

2. 选择模式（智能识别/统一行高）

3. 设置倍数值（支持 0.1-5.0）

4. 点击"应用到选中项"


### 查找替换

1. 切换到"查找替换"标签

2. 选择包含文本的图层

3. 输入查找内容（实时高亮显示）

4. 输入替换内容

5. 点击"全部替换"执行批量替换


## 🔄 更新日志


### v2.0.0 - 2025-07-02最新版

#### 新增功能

- ✨ 全新的查找替换功能

- ✨ 智能文本识别算法

- ✨ 实时文本高亮显示

- ✨ 快速定位文本图层


#### 界面优化

- 🎨 全新卡片化设计风格

- 🎨 大圆角视觉风格（16px主圆角）

- 🎨 黑白简约配色方案

- 🎨 优化的按钮和输入框样式

- 🎨 更柔和的 Toast 提示


#### 体验改进

- 📐 插件窗口高度增加到 720px

- ⏱️ Toast 提示显示时间延长至 4 秒

- 🔢 段落文本默认倍数调整为 1.8

- 🔢 行高计算改为向上取偶数

- 🔄 优化了刷新按钮位置


#### 技术优化

- 🚀 改进的文本节点查找算法

- 🚀 更准确的单行/段落文本判断

- 🚀 优化的字体加载处理

- 🚀 更好的错误处理机制


### v1.0.0 - 初始版本

- 基础行高设置功能

- 支持批量处理文本

- 简单的倍数设置


## 💡 使用提示


1. **智能识别准确性**：插件通过多种方式判断文本类型，包括换行符、自动调整属性、文本长度等

2. **混合字号处理**：包含多种字号的文本图层会被自动跳过

3. **字体加载**：插件会自动加载所需字体，部分特殊字体可能加载失败

4. **性能优化**：建议选择特定区域而非整个页面进行操作


## 🛠️ 技术支持


如遇到问题或有功能建议，欢迎反馈：

- 在 Figma 社区留言

- 提交 Issue 到项目仓库


---


Made with ❤️ for designers


---


# Font Size & Line Height Alignment Tool


A Figma plugin designed for designers to help you quickly unify text line heights and improve design consistency and efficiency.


## 🎯 Core Features


### 1. Smart Line Height Setting

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line text and paragraph text, applying different line height multipliers.

- Single-line text (e.g., titles, buttons): Default 1.0x

- Paragraph text (multi-line content): Default 1.8x

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all text.

- **Round Up to Nearest Even Number**: All line height values are automatically rounded up to the nearest even number to ensure pixel alignment.


### 2. Batch Find & Replace

- **Global Search**: Find all text within selected layers, frames, or groups.

- **Batch Replace**: Replace all matching text content with one click.

- **Live Preview**: Instantly highlights matching content as you type.

- **Smart Navigation**: Click on the text list to quickly navigate to the corresponding layer.


## 🎨 Design Features


- **Card-based Interface**: Modern, minimalist black and white design style.

- **Large Rounded Corners Aesthetic**: 16px rounded corner cards for a softer look.

- **Clear Interaction Feedback**: Orange highlights for primary actions, green for success states.

- **Optimized Layout**: 720px height to provide more content display space.


## 📝 How to Use


### Line Height Settings

1. Select the text layers, frames, or groups you want to adjust.

2. Choose a mode (Smart Detection / Uniform Line Height).

3. Set the multiplier value (supports 0.1-5.0).

4. Click "Apply to Selection".


### Find & Replace

1. Switch to the "Find & Replace" tab.

2. Select layers containing text.

3. Enter the search term (live highlighting).

4. Enter the replacement content.

5. Click "Replace All" to perform the batch replacement.


## 🔄 Changelog


### v2.0.0 - 2025-07-02 Latest Version

#### New Features

- ✨ All-new Find & Replace functionality.

- ✨ Smart text recognition algorithm.

- ✨ Real-time text highlighting.

- ✨ Quick navigation to text layers.


#### UI Optimization

- 🎨 New card-based design style.

- 🎨 Large rounded corner visual style (16px main radius).

- 🎨 Minimalist black and white color scheme.

- 🎨 Optimized button and input field styles.

- 🎨 Softer Toast notifications.


#### Experience Improvements

- 📐 Plugin window height increased to 720px.

- ⏱️ Toast notification display time extended to 4 seconds.

- 🔢 Default multiplier for paragraph text adjusted to 1.8.

- 🔢 Line height calculation changed to round up to the nearest even number.

- 🔄 Optimized the position of the refresh button.


#### Technical Optimizations

- 🚀 Improved text node finding algorithm.

- 🚀 More accurate single-line/paragraph text detection.

- 🚀 Optimized font loading handling.

- 🚀 Better error handling mechanism.


### v1.0.0 - Initial Release

- Basic line height setting feature.

- Support for batch processing text.

- Simple multiplier settings.


## 💡 Usage Tips


1. **Smart Detection Accuracy**: The plugin determines text type using various methods, including line breaks, auto-resize properties, and text length.

2. **Mixed Font Sizes**: Text layers containing multiple font sizes will be automatically skipped.

3. **Font Loading**: The plugin will automatically load required fonts, though some special fonts may fail to load.

4. **Performance Optimization**: It is recommended to select specific areas rather than the entire page for operations.


## 🛠️ Technical Support


If you encounter any issues or have feature suggestions, feel free to provide feedback:

- Leave a message in the Figma Community.

- Submit an Issue to the project repository.
plugins.tagline: 批量字号行高对齐

---


Made with ❤️ for designers


---


# Font Size & Line Height Alignment Tool


A Figma plugin designed for designers to help you quickly unify text line heights and improve design consistency and efficiency.


## 🎯 Core Features


### 1. Smart Line Height Setting

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line text and paragraph text, applying different line height multipliers.

- Single-line text (e.g., titles, buttons): Default 1.0x

- Paragraph text (multi-line content): Default 1.8x

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all text.

- **Round Up to Nearest Even Number**: All line height values are automatically rounded up to the nearest even number to ensure pixel alignment.


### 2. Batch Find & Replace

- **Global Search**: Find all text within selected layers, frames, or groups.

- **Batch Replace**: Replace all matching text content with one click.

- **Live Preview**: Instantly highlights matching content as you type.

- **Smart Navigation**: Click on the text list to quickly navigate to the corresponding layer.


## 🎨 Design Features


- **Card-based Interface**: Modern, minimalist black and white design style.

- **Large Rounded Corners Aesthetic**: 16px rounded corner cards for a softer look.

- **Clear Interaction Feedback**: Orange highlights for primary actions, green for success states.

- **Optimized Layout**: 720px height to provide more content display space.


## 📝 How to Use


### Line Height Settings

1. Select the text layers, frames, or groups you want to adjust.

2. Choose a mode (Smart Detection / Uniform Line Height).

3. Set the multiplier value (supports 0.1-5.0).

4. Click "Apply to Selection".


### Find & Replace

1. Switch to the "Find & Replace" tab.

2. Select layers containing text.

3. Enter the search term (live highlighting).

4. Enter the replacement content.

5. Click "Replace All" to perform the batch replacement.


## 🔄 Changelog


### v2.0.0 - 2025-07-02 Latest Version

#### New Features

- ✨ All-new Find & Replace functionality.

- ✨ Smart text recognition algorithm.

- ✨ Real-time text highlighting.

- ✨ Quick navigation to text layers.


#### UI Optimization

- 🎨 New card-based design style.

- 🎨 Large rounded corner visual style (16px main radius).

- 🎨 Minimalist black and white color scheme.

- 🎨 Optimized button and input field styles.

- 🎨 Softer Toast notifications.


#### Experience Improvements

- 📐 Plugin window height increased to 720px.

- ⏱️ Toast notification display time extended to 4 seconds.

- 🔢 Default multiplier for paragraph text adjusted to 1.8.

- 🔢 Line height calculation changed to round up to the nearest even number.

- 🔄 Optimized the position of the refresh button.


#### Technical Optimizations

- 🚀 Improved text node finding algorithm.

- 🚀 More accurate single-line/paragraph text detection.

- 🚀 Optimized font loading handling.

- 🚀 Better error handling mechanism.


### v1.0.0 - Initial Release

- Basic line height setting feature.

- Support for batch processing text.

- Simple multiplier settings.


## 💡 Usage Tips


1. **Smart Detection Accuracy**: The plugin determines text type using various methods, including line breaks, auto-resize properties, and text length.

2. **Mixed Font Sizes**: Text layers containing multiple font sizes will be automatically skipped.

3. **Font Loading**: The plugin will automatically load required fonts, though some special fonts may fail to load.

4. **Performance Optimization**: It is recommended to select specific areas rather than the entire page for operations.


## 🛠️ Technical Support


If you encounter any issues or have feature suggestions, feel free to provide feedback:

- Leave a message in the Figma Community.

- Submit an Issue to the project repository.

plugins.name: Detach Aliases
plugins.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

plugins.name: SPLOC - Selected the parent of component layer
plugins.description:
A plugin for Figma that automatically selects the parent component when any child within the component or its instance is selected.


Main features:

  1. Automatic detection and selection of the parent component
  2. Automatic collapse of the selected component
  3. On/Off switch to enable/disable functionality
  4. Memories the last selection to prevent cyclic selections


How to use:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Launch the plugin (it is active by default)
  3. Select any element within the component or its instance
  4. The plugin will automatically:
  5. Finds the parent component
  6. Select it
  7. Flattens the structure of the component


Interface:

  1. Compact window with ON/OFF switch
  2. The switch allows you to temporarily disable plugin functionality


Technical features:

  1. Works with components (COMPONENT) and their instances (INSTANCE)
  2. Prevents cyclic selections
  3. Optimized for working with large files
  4. Minimal impact on Figma performance


Application:

Ideal for working with large component systems where switching between children and parent components is often required.


----------------------------------------



Плагин для Figma, который автоматически выделяет родительский компонент при выборе любого дочернего элемента внутри компонента или его экземпляра.


Основные возможности:

  1. Автоматическое определение и выбор родительского компонента
  2. Автоматическое схлопывание (collapse) выбранного компонента
  3. Переключатель On/Off для включения/отключения функционала
  4. Запоминание последнего выбора для предотвращения циклических выделений


Как использовать:

  1. Установите плагин
  2. Запустите плагин (он активен по умолчанию)
  3. Выберите любой элемент внутри компонента или его экземпляра
  4. Плагин автоматически:
  5. Найдет родительский компонент
  6. Выделит его
  7. Схлопнет структуру компонента


Интерфейс:

  1. Компактное окно с переключателем ON/OFF
  2. Переключатель позволяет временно отключить функционал плагина


Технические особенности:

  1. Работает с компонентами (COMPONENT) и их экземплярами (INSTANCE)
  2. Предотвращает циклические выделения
  3. Оптимизирован для работы с большими файлами
  4. Минимальное влияние на производительность Figma


Применение:

Идеально подходит для работы с большими компонентными системами, где часто требуется переключение между дочерними элементами и родительскими компонентами.
plugins.tagline: Automatically selects parent component when child layer is selected

plugins.name: Sizr
plugins.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
plugins.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

111068.name: Sizr
111068.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
111068.release_notes:
Support for Components
Added:
- The plugin now supports resizing elements based on the grid of a parent `COMPONENT` in addition to a `FRAME`.
- Automatically detects whether the parent is a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a valid grid layout.
- Displays appropriate notifications if resizing is restricted (e.g., when dealing with a master component).

Fixed:
- Improved error handling and user feedback for unsupported parent types or missing grid layouts.

How to Use:
1. Select an element within a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a grid.
2. Trigger the plugin to resize compatible elements based on the grid layout.
111068.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

plugins.name: batchy
plugins.description:
batchy is a helper tool to make your exports more comfortable. Instead of just using the layer name and getting the layer size, you will now be able to write your own asset name dynamically with the help of export tokens and choosing between layer size or screen size for your assets.


Features

  1. dynamic asset names with several export tokens like: layers, date, file, scaling, index, user, top-level frame name,
  2. export assets in layer or screen size (top-level frame)
  3. export your current selection
  4. export from an asset list
  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
plugins.tagline: Export your designs with dynamic name behaviors.

  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
